metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38861 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The MPlayer Project mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to memory corruption via function free_mp_image() of libmpcodecs/mp_image.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer-gui - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2').
